title: Be One of Us!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Ah, hey Kotori-chan, look. It’s a roasted sweet potato truck nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>You’re right. You don’t see that often.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It must be so nice~. Rin wants some!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eh? Aren’t you on a diet right now, Rin-chan? If Umi-chan finds out....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>T-, that’s right nya....! Rin has to get on a scale tomorrow morning and report the results.... Aaah, but the sweet potatoes~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hmm.... Then, how about we buy a few and share them with everyone? I’m sure Umi-chan will be okay with that, and if she also eats one....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then she’ll be one of us nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Exactly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then it’s settled nya! Sweet potato truck~! Wait for me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Waaah!? R-, Rin-chan, wait~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
